rows.label: qev091901_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0001_2
rows.name: Are you the one here to help with testing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0002
rows.name: Good. You look tough. You'll do just fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0003
rows.name: The name's Alexa and I'm an Outfitter. Nice to meetcha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Should we get started?
I want to get to testing this new Skell weaponry ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0005
rows.name: And since you're so tough, the data should be great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Alexa what she needs you to do.

rows.label: qev091901_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev091901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Alexa if she really wants you to fight a Skell.

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0006
rows.name: Oh, yeah. Should probably explain that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0007
rows.name:
As I mentioned, I'm an Outfitter.
My job is testing new Skell weaponry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0008
rows.name: But in order to gather test data, I need a test subject.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0009
rows.name: And that test subject is YOU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, and feel free to hit back. Simulates combat better.
Plus it's more fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0011
rows.name: Yeeeees?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0012
rows.name: That's not a problem, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0013
rows.name: Look, don't worry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0014
rows.name:
I didn't ask you here just to be a bullet sponge.
C'mon! Fight back and stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0015
rows.name:
That better simulates real combat conditions anyway.
Plus it's a lot more fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0016
rows.name: We ready to begin now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0017
rows.name:
My Skell's tough, so no holding back.
Give me everything you got![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0018
rows.name: Whoa...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0019
rows.name:
You're strong. Like, REALLY strong.
I can't believe you beat my Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0020
rows.name: YOUR Skell? That's funny.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0021
rows.name:
That's a loaner from Sakuraba Industries.
A very EXPENSIVE loaner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0022
rows.name: Hey, Tika! Did you see that? Best test subject ever, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0023
rows.name:
Of course I saw itâ€”
I'm the lead designer on the weapon you're testing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0024
rows.name: You get some good data?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0025
rows.name: Amazing data, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0026
rows.name:
Although we have to take the client's Skell in for repairs
thanks to a certain SOMEONE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0027
rows.name: Still, I'd call it a net positive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0028
rows.name:
Hey, it wasn't me that broke the Skell.
Besides, that's how tests go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0029
rows.name: Didn't you tell the subject to fight back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0030
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0031
rows.name: Oh for...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0032
rows.name: You're something else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0033
rows.name: Look, you mind handling the next test in place of Alexa?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev091901_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that no mission is too big or small for you.

rows.label: qev091901_JNK0040
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: qev091901_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Tika that you need to think it over.

rows.label: qev091901_JNK0050
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev091901_SEL0051
rows.name: Turn down Tika's offer.

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0034
rows.name: Hey, wait! I'm coming too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0035
rows.name:
Watching stronger people is the best way to learn.
It'll make me a better pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0036
rows.name:
Ooh! I'm free! I'll go!
You'll come too, right? Come on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0037
rows.name:
Watching stronger people is the best way to learn.
It'll make me a better pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0038
rows.name: No deal, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0039
rows.name: Then I suppose I'll have to ask Alexa to handle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0040
rows.name: Aw, come on. You should come with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0041
rows.name:
I'm trying to become a better pilot,
and observing stronger people is the best way for me to grow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0042
rows.name: Sounds like it's settled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0043
rows.name: So I need help with a ramjet rifle performance test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0044
rows.name:
I'm short on field-application data,
so I want you to engage some indigens with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0045
rows.name: Oh! Are we testing a Skell weapon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0046
rows.name: Sorry, it's ground gear. Is that a deal-breaker?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0047
rows.name: Nah, I'm still in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0048
rows.name:
I mean, yeah, if it were a Skell weapon,
I'd have been SUPER in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0049
rows.name:
But I believe research doesn't have
to be exciting to be world-changing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0050
rows.name: Yeah, it's...not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0051
rows.name:
But I still need the test done.
Oh, and thanks for babysitting Alexa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091901_MSG0052
rows.name: I have high hopes for you.[ST:wait ]
